title: RIOT PLS RESPOND Does winning promos affect your starting rank?
body: so jsut for clarity, if i rioter could hook me up, is it your overall performance rather than your wins/loses that affect your starting rank? just curious.

replies.body: Yes, wins in placement games do matter...to some extent at least.

Starting rank is based heavily on your previous season ending rank (plus the soft reset so a little lower) +/ - 2~ tiers based on how many of your provis games you win/lose.

Just estimations of course, but the short answer is yes, wins in provisionals do matter.

>
> Starting rank is based heavily on your previous season ending rank (plus the soft reset so a little lower) +/ - 2~ tiers based on how many of your provis games you win/lose.
> 
> Just estimations of course, but the short answer is yes, wins in provisionals do matter.

but what im saying, is do the performances in losses matter? thanks for the clarity though

To the best of my knowledge no, or at least not much. LP is based of straight up win loss (since performance will average out) and I believe MMR is the same, however given that Riot's calculations for MMR are hidden it could very well be based on some kind of performance metrics. In fact it may even be why the calculations are hidden, so as not to disclose what is used to determine performance so it can't be abused.

If MMR is based on performance then yes, and visa versa, but that's something we just don't know.
Yes more wins usually = a better ranking. If you get 5 wins you should break even to your last rank (This isn't always the case)
